text: Pascal Soriot (born 23 May 1959) è un imprenditore francese. È attuale amministratore delegato della multinazionale farmaceutica anglo-svedese AstraZeneca dall'ottobre 2012. == Biography == Soriot was born in France and studied veterinary medicine at the École nationale vétérinaire d'Alfort. Then He completed an MBA at HEC Paris. In 1996 he became general manager of the chemical company Hoechst Marion Roussel in Australia. In 2000 he was nominated head of Aventis USA, a pharmaceutical company that changed its name to Sanofi in 2004.QUI EST PASCAL SORIOT, CE FRANÇAIS DE PICARDIE À LA TÊTE D'ASTRAZENECA?
